scripts.dev: npm run install:all && concurrently -n backend,frontend -c yellow,cyan "yes | npm --prefix backend run dev" "wait-on http://localhost:3033 && npm --prefix frontend start"
scripts.start: npm run install:all && npm --prefix frontend run build && npm --prefix backend run build && NODE_ENV=production npm --prefix backend start
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm --prefix frontend install && npm --prefix backend install
scripts.cypress:basic: concurrently -k -s first "NODE_ENV=development PORT=3032 npm --prefix backend start" "wait-on http://localhost:3032 && CYPRESS_BASE_URL=http://localhost:3032 cypress run --spec 'cypress/e2e/basic-functionality.cy.ts'"
scripts.cypress:open: concurrently --kill-others --success first --color always "FORCE_COLOR=1 npm run start:auth" "wait-on http://localhost:3032 && FORCE_COLOR=1 CYPRESS_BASE_URL=http://localhost:3032 cypress open"
scripts.db:auth: docker exec -it supertokens_db psql -U supertokens_user -d supertokens
